moves.1. e4: I used a lot of conditional moves. It drove my friend crazy! :)
moves.1... e6: e3, he wants to play it safe.
moves.2. Nf3: knight is lookin for a victory........
moves.5. Bg5: I use this technique a lot. It never seems to work though.
moves.6. c4: I decide to get rid of that pawn.
moves.7... Bd7: He decides to play it safe.
moves.8. Bxf6: I thought this might be a useful move
moves.9. Nbd2: I saw his plan. He wanted to take down my rook with no trouble but no!
moves.11... a5: Trying to break free. Not a good move. Not necessary.
moves.14. Ng5: Oh no! My knight is wide open!
moves.14... Bc8: But, does he care? He is greedy. He wants the rook.
moves.15. Qf3: I try to sneak this by
moves.15... Qxd4: ?????????????? You had a rook, and you choose a knight? What about a defense?
moves.18. Qe7#: CHECKMATE! My friend played a pretty good game compared to the others he played.
